Welcome to the game guide on how to play Gem Seeker! 

 Here, the objective of the game is to mine all the gems in the fewest scans possible. 
 The total number of gems available to be mined will be displayed on the top left corner of the game screen. The total number of scans you've made so far will be counted on the top right. 

 To perform a scan (and dig!), tap on a square or gem on the grid. For every scan you make, either a gem or a number will appear on the square you've tapped on. Successful finds do not count as a scan, but a scan on a gem found can be performed by tapping on the same location again. The number that appears signifies the total number of gems that are in the same row and column as the square. As gems are found in these rows and columns, the respective numbers displayed on these squares will decrement. 
 When the game is won, all numbers will display '0'.
